TREATMENT AND REHABILITATION OF SPINE INJURED(PARAPLEGIC) PATIENTS. 9.FREE THEATRE WORKSHOPS FOR CHILDREN DURING SUMMER VACATIONS TO PROMOTE THEATRE AMONGST CHILDREN. 10. ORGANISING A WEEK LONG THEATRE FEST IN JANUARY EVERY YEAR TO REVIVE ART OF THEATRE PERFORMANCE IN U.P.
